section.name: Introduction
section.p: To enable the spatial extensions, you must put the hibernate-spatial.jar, the java topology suite (JTS) plus a hibernate spatial dialect provider in your class path. Hibernate-spatial provides the core extension classes, and the fundamental GeometryUserType class. The Dialect providers contribute the database specific information about that database handling of geographic data.
Currently two dialect providers exists: hibernate-spatial-oracle and hibernate-spatial-postgis.
